note.p: Daughter of Edward Cresy (1792–1858) and his wife, Eliza, of Suffolk Street, London. Sister of Edward Cresy (1824–70).
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/922/115/10)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 June 2020)
